```{r}
library(MASS)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
N = 1e7
mu0 = 10
mu1 = 15
sigma0 = 3
sigma1 = 4.5
sigma_01 = 2

wage = data.table(
                  mvrnorm(n=N,
                          mu=c(mu0, mu1),
                          Sigma=matrix(c(sigma0, sigma_01, sigma_01, sigma1), 
                                       ncol=2))
                  )


wage = wage %>% mutate(I = if_else(V2>V1 ,1,0))
```

```{r}
E_w0_I = (wage %>% filter(I==0))$V1 %>% mean
E_w1_I = (wage %>% filter(I==0))$V2 %>% mean

calc_Q0 = mu0 + (sigma0 * sigma1)/sigma_01 * ()
```
